title: Benoît Bourrust
text:
Benoît Bourrust (born 16 Jun 1985) is a French <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player. A prop forward, he played for <a href="Auch">Auch</a>, <a href="Sale%20Sharks">Sale Sharks</a> and <a href="USA%20Perpignan">Perpignan</a>.
For the start of the 2012-13 season he signed for Welsh team <a href="Cardiff%20Blues">Cardiff Blues</a>.
